page.title: 01SIBLEY'S OF TOOT HILL
page.content: {Mr Sibley}is a coal merchant . He delivers {coal}to {Lordshill,Toothill {Nursling }and {Rownhams .}He has removal lorries . Some of his lorries are very old .{Mr Sibley }has two old cars . One is a {Rolls Royce }from 1927 . On the front it has an {Angel}. Mr Sibley has a {barrel organ .}He has things from{ World War 2 }such as Gas masks, helmets and other things.{He's {one of the editors}of Rownhams and Nursling magazine . In {Mr Sibleys} old back yard there is a {Medieval {road which runs through Nightingale {Wood}.There is a footpath which follows it.The medieval road soon goes quite near to {Bakers Drove}. It eventually goes down into {Winchester then it goes across the River Test. The medieval road has got one ditch each side of the road.
